name: Kekcroc 3D: Spring Cleaning & Gardening Edition
description:
This is a short game made for #GreatSpringGameJam2021. It's designed to be a short prequel to my main project, Kekcroc 3D. There's not much to it, it's a very short game.

Kekcroc has to dust his home and work on his garden so he can have a nice birthday celebration!

Controls: 

WASD to move

Hold right click and move your mouse to turn your camera

E to interact

Space to jump
